Interface Summary
functionTables.periodicWaveform  
HitDecorator interface for decorating hitinterfaces

RideMixer  
RiffAntiChain implements a meta-Riff that plays riffs in parallel. watch out for side effects of your riffs yourself!
RiffChain class that implements riff chains, for convenience, because it simply puts all its riffs on the stack and says bye bye!
RiffXmlAttributes handles Riff XML tag attributes/parameters
RiffXmlHandler This class takes riff xml input from sax and generates intermediate structures that will result in the final RiffInterface
